Policies and Initiatives.title: Why Tamil Nadu Isn’t Waiting for Students to Visit Tech Conferences
Policies and Initiatives.summary: Tamil Nadu's IT minister Palanivel Thiaga Rajan thinks software development is no longer a default career choice. The state is taking proactive steps to engage with students, rather than waiting for them to attend tech conferences. This approach aims to promote awareness and interest in the field among students.

Policies and Initiatives.title: SanchiConnect Partners With Tamil Nadu & iTNT to Support Deep Tech Startups in Tier-2, 3 Cities
Policies and Initiatives.summary: SanchiConnect has partnered with Tamil Nadu and iTNT to support deep tech startups in Tier-2 and 3 cities. The initiative aims to build a sustainable ecosystem for innovation across key sectors, including climate technology and health tech. This partnership seeks to foster growth and development in these areas.

Policies and Initiatives.title: Sarvam AI signs MoU with TN Govt to set up  sovereign AI park with ₹10,000 cr investment
Policies and Initiatives.summary: Sarvam AI has signed a Memorandum of Understanding (MoU) with the Tamil Nadu government to establish a sovereign AI park. The project is expected to attract an investment of ₹10,000 crore. This initiative aims to promote the development of artificial intelligence in the region.

Events.title: Why The AI Foundry by Tredence in Chennai is a Working Room for Builders, Not Another Conference
Events.summary: The AI Foundry by Tredence in Chennai is a closed-door workshop where senior practitioners design and prototype production-ready AI systems. This working room is geared towards builders, differing from traditional conferences. Participants will collaborate to create functional AI systems in a hands-on environment.

Major AI Developments.title: Zoho Launches AI-native ERP Platform From Rural Tamil Nadu
Major AI Developments.summary: Zoho has launched a low-code, AI-native ERP platform for end-to-end financial and operational management. The platform, called Zoho ERP, offers a comprehensive solution for businesses. It was launched from Zoho's rural Tamil Nadu location.

Major AI Developments.title: Tredence Introduces Agentic Commerce Accelerators for Retailers
Major AI Developments.summary: Tredence has introduced Agentic Commerce Accelerators, a framework that utilizes agents to interpret shopper intent. The framework orchestrates personalized interactions for retailers, enhancing their customer experience. This technology aims to provide tailored interactions for shoppers, potentially boosting retail sales and customer satisfaction.
